selected_quotes: Implementation of #AntimicrobialStewardship Programs in Small Community Hospitals-commentary
+ Commentary on implementation of #antimicrobialstewardship in small hospitals by Drs. Daniel Sexton
#AntimicrobialStewardship in Small Community Hospitals: Recognizing Barriers Meeting the Challenge
Small community hospitals w/o functioning ASP should start a program even if limited scope/ modest goals
Community hospitals have limited resources, but #antibioticstewardship is still possible in these settings
